abstract: A longtime Bank of America shareholder began a formal campaign on Monday to strip Kenneth D. Lewis of his chairman title, saying the bank took on too much risk by acquiring Merrill Lynch, Reuters reported.
lead_paragraph: A longtime Bank of America shareholder began a formal campaign on Monday to strip Kenneth D. Lewis of his chairman title, saying the bank took on too much risk by acquiring Merrill Lynch, Reuters reported.

headline.main: BofA Investor Seeks Removal of Lewis as Chairman

abstract: Glenn Schorr, the banking analyst from UBS, is leaving the firm, according to an internal memo Tuesday obtained by Dealbook.
snippet: Glenn Schorr, the banking analyst from UBS, is leaving the firm, according to an internal memo Tuesday obtained by Dealbook.
lead_paragraph: Glenn Schorr, the banking analyst from UBS, is leaving the firm, according to an internal memo Tuesday obtained by Dealbook.

headline.main: Analysts at UBS and Bank of America to Leave
